Mod.Name: Horizon Pack Plus (World Textures)
Mod.Author: MCINDUS + Nameless27 + Slimebucket
Mod.Description:
Horizon Pack Plus - World Texture replacement mod. - Version 2.4 now out! Fatal crash at Rinoa's house during assassin mission has been fixed!
- Towns, world and field model textures re-created using ESRGAN + Gigapixel AI
Original mod Horizonpack v1.0 created by MCINDUS + FatedCourage ffnx conversion to ffnx Nameless27 extra work and junction8 conversion by Slimebucket

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: version 2.4 - fatal crash at Rinoa's house when doing assassin mission version 2.3 - fatal crash fixed! version 2.2 - fixes field model option! version 2.0 - adds map and field model options
